item.description:
The next wine selections (tied at 72%) were French Burgundy and French Bordeaux.
So lets pick French Burgundy.

I'll present a couple of wines and would like two more people to also present.
Remember Burgundy also has some great whites (Chardonnay)

Please let me know if you could offer appetizers, wine presentation or would like to host the event.


Thanks,
Mike

About this Meetup
item.why: You'll love it because we're tasting 6 French Burgundies and a mystery wine.
item.name: AWS Feb Meeting - CANCELED
